verbs.description: audit procedures for income statements [ARG0: small - business owners] [V: facing] [ARG1: their first audit] might not know what to expect auditors gain reasonable assurance over the financial statements taken as a whole by examining transaction on a test basis while you may not know exactly what your auditors will be testing it can be useful to understand some common audit audit
